metadata.name: The Binding of Jesus Holybirth+
metadata.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Awa5JhQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oPSTGjA.png[/img] Screw Isaac! Jesus is the new star in The Binding of Jesus HolyBirth+! Jesus and his mom live happily in heaven until Satan that pretends to be god demands jesus's mom to take his son on his cross and kill him, jesus fell from the sky and he wants to return home, can you help him out? [img]http://i.imgur.com/swV4U4P.png[/img] - Brand NEW Custom Menu Soundtrack! - New Custom Intro Cutscene with Voiceover done by BroskiPlays - Custom Floor music for Church - Holy Monstro! - New Bomby mob! - Changed the Rock color - Jesus now has a familiar at his side - Hearts are Replaced by Crosses - Pickup Cards have been modified - Treasure Room jingles are Modified - Added 1 NEW Item Trinity - Brand NEW Pause Menu - New Icons - New Blue HUD NEW FLOORS: The Church,Heaven NEW DOOR DESIGNS NEW CHARACTER: Jesus Christ NEW PICKUP SPRITES NEW ENTITIES & MORE! [img]http://i.imgur.com/HhjpnFc.png[/img] - 200 NEW Items - 100 NEW Enemies - 500 NEW Rooms - 7 New RoomTypes - New Pickups - New Cards - 20 NEW Bosses - All Bosses replaced by their "Holy" Variants - 70 NEW Trinkets - Soundtracks for every Floor - 200 NEW Costumes - New Main Menu & HUD Display - 30 NEW Transformations - Removing all the Annoying shit including (Bloats, Portals, Skullies & many more of those motherf*ckers) - NEW Gameplay Mechanics & Many Many More! [img]http://i.imgur.com/gR6wuuZ.png[/img] Update Log 17 January 2017 Alpha 1.03:
- Added 1 new Enemy called The Bleeder - 4 New Passive Items & 1 New Active Item these include: Elemental Fire Elemental Thunder Holy Tears Trinity Jesus Wine - Fixed the Rooms on Church - Fixed the Name Bug - Jesus finally got his Starter Item: Jesus Wine is now in the mod! - Fixed mostly performance issues or graphical glitches - Changed the chests with new retextures - We changed the starterroom to something more risk rewarding
Check back tomorrow for a new update of The Binding of Jesus! We are so excited to keep bringing out more updates daily along the way, and we hope that you guys will love our mod. Enjoy!
Jesus Head is from the Savior Mod made by "otherhand24" please support his mod aswell! https://moddingofisaac.com/mod/93/the-savior-mod-pack
